member.name: M:OresundBronTicketLibrary.OresundCar.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Use this constructor to create a new car.
member.param: License plate of the used vehicle.
Set "true" if a Brobizz is used. Set "false" or "null" if no Brobizz is used.

member.name: P:OresundBronTicketLibrary.OresundCar.TicketPrice
member.summary: Use this property to specify the ticket price for this vehicle type.

member.name: M:OresundBronTicketLibrary.OresundCar.VehicleType
member.summary: Use this method to specify the vehicle type.

member.name: M:OresundBronTicketLibrary.OresundCar.Price
member.summary: This method returns the price including an eventual Brobizz discount.
